trans-unit.source: You’ve lived a sheltered life. Your childhood was safe and secure, so you didn’t get a chance to learn much about the world—and even less chance to experience it. Whether you were training for something, had your nose in a book, or just were sequestered in a secluded place, you haven’t done much, met many people, or seen many interesting things so far. That’s probably going to change soon, but as you go forward into a larger world, you do so without some of the understanding that others possess about how it all works.
trans-unit.target: You’ve lived a sheltered life. Your childhood was safe and secure, so you didn’t get a chance to learn much about the world—and even less chance to experience it. Whether you were training for something, had your nose in a book, or just were sequestered in a secluded place, you haven’t done much, met many people, or seen many interesting things so far. That’s probably going to change soon, but as you go forward into a larger world, you do so without some of the understanding that others possess about how it all works.

trans-unit.source: Fresh: You add +1 to your recovery rolls.
trans-unit.target: Fresh: You add +1 to your recovery rolls.

trans-unit.source: Incorruptible: You are trained in Intellect defense tasks and all tasks that involve resisting temptation.
trans-unit.target: Incorruptible: You are trained in Intellect defense tasks and all tasks that involve resisting temptation.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re wide-eyed. You are trained in perception tasks.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re wide-eyed. You are trained in perception tasks.

trans-unit.source: Inability: Any task that involves seeing through deceptions or determining someone’s secret motive is hindered.
trans-unit.target: Inability: Any task that involves seeing through deceptions or determining someone’s secret motive is hindered.

trans-unit.source: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.
trans-unit.target: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.

trans-unit.source: Someone told you that you should get involved.
trans-unit.target: Someone told you that you should get involved.

trans-unit.source: You needed money, and this seemed like a good way to earn some.
trans-unit.target: You needed money, and this seemed like a good way to earn some.

trans-unit.source: You believed that you could learn a lot by joining the other PCs.
trans-unit.target: You believed that you could learn a lot by joining the other PCs.
